control_attributes.control_description: The information system provides the capability for authorized users to remotely view/hear all content related to an established user session in real time.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization employs trend analyses to determine if security control implementations, the frequency of continuous monitoring activities, and/or the types of activities used in the continuous monitoring process need to be modified based on empirical data.

Control Statement: The information system provides the capability for authorized users to remotely view/hear all content related to an established user session in real time.
